<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reverse Engineering](/Feats.aspx?ID=2059) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 190 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Scrounger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=75)

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4); [Scrounger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2058)

</column>

---

You are able to reverse engineer items into formulas more effectively than most. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) checks to reverse engineer a formula from an item. Additionally, if you get a critical success on your Crafting check, you can opt to not only create the formula but also reassemble the original item at the same time, leaving you with the formula and the item instead of the formula and raw materials equal to half the item's value.
name: Reverse Engineering
